posts.description: What I learned about Trump from bingeing The Apprentice | Fusion
posts.extended: Back in 2004, a television show helped remake Donald Trump’s career. It was called The Apprentice, and it was a huge hit. Before the The Apprentice, Trump was essentially a local New York City celebrity.

posts.description: We Asked a Philosopher Whether or Not It’s OK to Do Drugs | VICE | United States
posts.extended: Peg O' Connor has made thinking about drugs her life's work.
